thread.title: Dakota Johnson Rocks 'Flamenco Dancer' Chic at Vanity Fair Party
thread.title_full: Dakota Johnson Rocks 'Flamenco Dancer' Chic at Vanity Fair Party

title: Dakota Johnson Rocks 'Flamenco Dancer' Chic at Vanity Fair Party

organizations.name: vanity fair party dakota johnson rocks

text:
Dakota Johnson Rocks 'Flamenco Dancer' Chic at Vanity Fair Party Michele Zipp Share 
Emma McIntyre/Getty Images for Vanity Fair Just about any time Dakota Johnson steps out of the house, she inspires us with whatever it is she is wearing -- and it doesn't matter if it's jeans or evening gowns. At the Vanity Fair Young Hollywood party , Dakota took things to another level of cool: black, peek-a-boo lace. It's beyond. 
Dakota's partially see-through dress is by Dior (love!), and our Anastasia Steele told TWD : "I'm wearing it because it kind of looks like a sexual-like flamenco dancer." Fierce. 
More from CafeMom: Jamie Dornan & Amelia Warner Look Smitten on BAFTAs Red Carpet 
We love the vibe. This dress would be perfect to wear to a friend's wedding or a super fancy night out to dinner with your sweetheart. There is a bit of a vintage nod to it thanks to those tassels, and it's sexy without being over the top. It's totally Dakota. The night was a big one for the Fifty Shades Darker star. She was one of the cohosts for the event, along with Krista Smith, the executive West Coast editor of Vanity Fair . 
Dakota has a very distinct style, and though the clothes she wears for events vary in design, they all have one thing in common -- they are wearable, and never does she look uncomfortable in them. She wears the clothes; the clothes do not wear her. And every time, she inspires us. Flamenco, anyone?
